doc:
Don Adams https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Adams 0 Donald James Yarmy (April 13, 1923 – September 25, 2005), known professionally as Don Adams, was an American actor, comedian and director. In his five decades on television, he was best known as Maxwell Smart (Agent 86) in the television situation comedy Get Smart (1965–70, 1995), which he also sometimes directed and wrote. Adams won three consecutive Emmy Awards for his performance in the series (1967–69). Adams also provided the voices for the animated series Tennessee Tuxedo and His Tales (1963–66) and Inspector Gadget (1983–85) as well as several revivals and spinoffs of the latter in the 1990s. Donald_James_Yarmy ( April_13_,_1923 – September_25_,_2005 ) , known professionally as Don_Adams , was an_American_actor , comedian_and_director . In his_five_decades on television , he was_best_known as Maxwell_Smart_(_Agent_86_) in the_television_situation_comedy Get Smart_(_1965 – 70_,_1995_) , which he also sometimes directed and wrote . Adams won three_consecutive_Emmy_Awards for his_performance in the_series_(_1967 – 69_) . Adams also provided the_voices for the_animated_series_Tennessee_Tuxedo and His_Tales_(_1963 – 66_) and Inspector_Gadget_(_1983 – 85 ) as_well_as several_revivals_and_spinoffs of the_latter in the_1990s .
